name: Cyber Missile
description:
It's an endless runner game,  where you drive your cybertruck. Destroy the enemys, dodge barriers, earn XP and customize your truck!

You can shoot missiles with your armed cybertruck(machine gun in development)

There is only 1 game mode(the endless runner, in development more game modes)

There is 3 + 1 types of enemys:

car with minigun,  police car, 2 trucks

From XP you can color your truck(textures in development)

Available 2 controll modes: touch, tilt phone

This is only the alpha test!!!
